explains: adj. 通货膨胀的；充了气的；价格飞涨的；（植物）肿胀的
v. 膨胀（inflate 的过去式和过去分词）；使充气；抬高（物价）

sentences.en: They inflated their clients' medical injuries and treatment to defraud insurance companies.
sentences.cn: 他们夸大了客户受伤及治疗的情况以欺骗保险公司。

sentences.en: He sang as he walked, and he walked as he sang, and got more inflated every minute.
sentences.cn: 他边走边唱，边唱边走，每一分钟都变得越来越膨胀。

sentences.en: He has an inflated sense of his own importance.
